resource_dependency.stockDataAPI: Requires integration with a stock market data API such as Alpha Vantage, Yahoo Finance, or similar to fetch real-time stock information.
resource_dependency.autoSuggestionEndpoint: Endpoint returning suggested stock names/codes based on partial user input (e.g., '/api/suggest-stonks?q={query}')

function: Implement a search functionality allowing users to input stock codes or names
static_description: A centered search bar with a placeholder 'Enter stock code or name', accompanied by a search icon on the right side. Background is white, and the input field has navy borders and text.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the search icon or pressing Enter after typing initiates the search process.
Pressing Enter while focused in the search box triggers the search action.

resource_dependency.suggestionListStyle: Dropdown list styled with white background and navy text, showing matching stock suggestions dynamically as the user types.

function: Provide auto-suggestions or dropdown options during stock search
static_description: As the user types into the search bar, a dropdown menu appears below it containing potential matches from the stock database.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking a suggestion populates the search bar with that selection and triggers the display of the associated stock data.

resource_dependency.basicStockInfoSchema: Database table named 'stocks' with fields: id (primary key), ticker_symbol (string), company_name (string), current_price (float), last_updated (datetime).

function: Display basic stock information including company name, ticker symbol, and current price
static_description: Displays a card with the company logo, company name, ticker symbol, and current price arranged vertically. All text is navy against a white background.

resource_dependency.chartLibrary: Integration with charting library like Chart.js or D3.js for rendering market trend visuals.
resource_dependency.marketTrendDataSchema: Table 'market_trends' with fields: stock_id (foreign key), date (date), open_price (float), close_price (float), high_price (float), low_price (float), volume (integer)

function: Show market trend data with charts or graphs for selected stocks
static_description: A line chart showing historical closing prices over time, rendered within a container with white background and navy axis labels.

interaction_and_states.description: Hovering over points on the chart displays tooltips with exact values and dates.

resource_dependency.financialDataSchema: Database table 'financial_data' with fields: stock_id (foreign key), earnings (float), revenue (float), pe_ratio (float), debt_equity_ratio (float), roe (float)

function: Present financial data such as earnings, revenue, and key financial ratios
static_description: A section displaying key metrics in labeled boxes (Earnings, Revenue, P/E Ratio, Debt-to-Equity, ROE) with navy headers and values on a white background.

function: Enable users to select different report formats (PDF, HTML, etc.)
static_description: Radio buttons or dropdown labeled 'Report Format' with options 'PDF' and 'HTML'. Default selection is PDF. Styled with navy text and white background.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting an option updates the preview and prepares the report for export in the selected format.

function: Allow users to customize report content by choosing specific sections or data points
static_description: Checkboxes grouped under 'Customize Report Content', allowing users to toggle inclusion of various report sections. Each checkbox label is navy on a white background.

interaction_and_states.description: Checking/unchecking a box adds/removes the respective section from the generated report.

resource_dependency.reportGenerationService: Backend service responsible for compiling selected data and formatting into chosen output type (PDF/HTML).
resource_dependency.reportTemplateFiles: Templates for PDF and HTML report structures stored server-side.

function: Generate automated stock reports based on user selections and inputs
static_description: A 'Generate Report' button positioned beneath customization controls. When clicked, it compiles the report using selected settings and displays a loading indicator.

interaction_and_states.description: Triggers report compilation using selected parameters and shows a progress spinner until completion.

resource_dependency.summaryContentSchema: Field in 'reports' table storing summarized insights/recommendations per report instance.

function: Include a report summary section highlighting key insights and recommendations
static_description: A dedicated section titled 'Summary' appearing at the top of each generated report, summarizing key findings and actionable insights.

resource_dependency.exportHandler: Server endpoint to deliver compiled report file upon request (e.g., /api/export-report/{reportId})

function: Provide export functionality to download generated reports in chosen formats
static_description: A download icon next to the 'Generate Report' button which becomes active once the report is ready. Clicking it downloads the report in the previously selected format.

interaction_and_states.description: Downloads the completed report file directly to the userâ€™s device.

function: Implement a clean user interface with white background and navy component colors
static_description: Entire UI uses a consistent color scheme of white backgrounds and navy blue text/components throughout all pages and elements.

function: Add loading indicators or progress bars during report generation process
static_description: Displays a centered circular loading animation when the report is being generated, overlayed on the main content area.

errorMessages: Data temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

function: Include error handling for invalid stock codes or unavailable data
static_description: An alert-style message box appears above the search bar whenever an invalid query results in no matches or data unavailability.

resource_dependency.authSystem: User authentication system supporting login/signup flows with session persistence.
resource_dependency.preferencesStorageSchema: Database table 'user_preferences' storing user-selected defaults for report format, included sections, etc.

function: Provide user authentication or session management for saving preferences
static_description: Top-right corner contains either 'Login'/'Signup' links or a logged-in user profile badge depending on auth status. Preferences panel accessible only when authenticated.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Login' opens modal form; successful login enables access to saved preferences panel.

resource_dependency.mediaQueries: CSS media queries ensuring layout adapts to mobile, tablet, and desktop viewports.

function: Enable responsive design for accessibility across different devices and screen sizes
static_description: All UI components adjust their size and arrangement based on viewport width, maintaining usability and readability on phones, tablets, and desktop browsers.
